<span data-ttu-id="0994f-237">ユーザーがコントロールの内容を変更できるかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-237">Determines whether the user can change the contents of the control.</span></span>

    public boolean allowEdit([boolean value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-238">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-238">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-239">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-239">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-240">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-240">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-241">コントロールを編集することができる場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-241">true if the control can be edited; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-242">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-242">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-243">コンテナー コントロールにこのプロパティが設定されると、コンテナー内のすべてのコントロールの変更は無効または有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-243">When this property is set on a container control, modifications are disabled or enabled for all controls within the container.</span></span>

### <a name="method-autodeclaration"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-244">メソッド autoDeclaration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-244">Method autoDeclaration</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-245">システムがコントロールと同じ名前を持つメンバー変数を宣言できるかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-245">Determines whether the system can declare a member variable that has the same name as the control.</span></span>

    public boolean autoDeclaration([boolean value])

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-247">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-247">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-248">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-248">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-249">このコントロールのためにメンバー変数を宣言することができる場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-249">true if the member variable can be declared for this control; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-250">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-250">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-251">コントロールには同じ名前を付けることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-251">Controls cannot have identical names.</span></span>

### <a name="method-backgroundcolor"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-256">メソッド backgroundColor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-256">Method backgroundColor</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-257">コントロールの背景色を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-257">Gets or sets the background color of the control.</span></span>

    public int backgroundColor([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-258">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-258">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-259">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-259">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-260">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-260">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-261">パックされた RGB カラーを含む整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-261">An integer that contains a packed RGB color.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-262">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-262">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-263">返される整数には、次のようにパックされた RGB カラーが含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-263">The integer that is returned contains a packed RGB color as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-264">下位バイトには赤の相対強度の値が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-264">The low-order byte contains a value for the relative intensity of red.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-265">2 番目のバイトには緑の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-265">The second byte contains a value for green.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-266">3 番目のバイトには青の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-266">The third byte contains a value for blue.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-267">上位バイトはゼロでなければなりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-267">The high-order byte must be zero.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-268">1 バイトの最大値は 255 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-268">The maximum value for a single byte is 255.</span></span>

### <a name="method-backstyle"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-269">メソッド backStyle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-269">Method backStyle</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-270">コントロールの背景色を透明にできるかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-270">Determines whether the control background can be transparent.</span></span>

    public int backStyle([int value])

### <a name="method-bold"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-279">メソッド bold</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-279">Method bold</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-280">コントロール内のテキストを出力するのに使用されるフォントの重量を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-280">Gets or sets the weight of font used to output text in the control.</span></span>

    public int bold([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-281">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-281">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-282">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-282">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-283">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-283">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-284">0 から 9 までの間の整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-284">An integer value between zero and nine, inclusive.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-285">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-285">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-286">返される整数には、次のようなフォントの重量が含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-286">The integer that is returned contains the weight of the font as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-287">0 既定のフォントの重量を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-287">0 Use the default font weight.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-288">1 シン。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-288">1 Thin.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-289">2 エクストラ ライト。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-289">2 Extra-light.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-290">3. ライト。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-290">3 Light.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-291">4 標準。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-291">4 Normal.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-292">5 中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-292">5 Medium.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-293">6 セミボールド。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-293">6 Semibold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-294">7 太字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-294">7 Bold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-295">8 極太。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-295">8 Extra-bold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-296">9 ヘビー。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-296">9 Heavy.</span></span>

### <a name="method-border"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-297">メソッド border</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-297">Method border</span></span>

    public int border([int value])

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-302">ゼロから 4 までの整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-302">An integer between zero and four, inclusive.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-303">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-303">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-304">返される整数には、次のようなコントロールの境界線のスタイルが含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-304">The integer that is returned contains the style of the borderline of the control as follows:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-305">値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-305">Value.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-306">説明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-306">Description.</span></span> |
|--------|--------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-307">0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-307">0</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-308">自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-308">Auto.</span></span>        |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-309">1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-309">1</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-310">3D。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-310">3D.</span></span>          |

| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-313">3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-313">3</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-314">均一。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-314">Flat.</span></span>        |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-315">4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-315">4</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-316">なし。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-316">None.</span></span>        |

### <a name="method-buttondisplay"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-317">メソッド buttonDisplay</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-317">Method buttonDisplay</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-318">ボタン コントロールの外観を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-318">Gets or sets the appearance of the button control.</span></span>

    public int buttonDisplay([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-319">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-319">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-320">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-320">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-321">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-321">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-322">ゼロから 5 までの整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-322">An integer between zero and five, inclusive.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-323">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-323">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-324">プロパティ値は、テキスト、画像、またはその両方のいずれをボタンに表示するかを定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-324">The value of the property defines whether the text, the image, or both should be displayed on the button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0994f-325">このプロパティは、テキストと画像の両方が表示されている場合は、テキストと画像の相対位置も制御します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-325">This property also controls relative positions of text and image if both are displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0994f-326">返される整数値には、次のようなボタン コントロールの外観が含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-326">The integer value that is returned contains the appearance of the button control as follows:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-327">値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-327">Value.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-328">説明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-328">Description.</span></span>                                                     |
|--------|------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-329">0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-329">0</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-330">テキストのみ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-330">Text only.</span></span>                                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-331">1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-331">1</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-332">イメージのみ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-332">Image Only.</span></span>                                                      |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-333">2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-333">2</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-334">テキストと画像。画像はテキストの下に表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-334">Text and image; the image is displayed below the text.</span></span>           |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-335">3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-335">3</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-336">テキストと画像。画像はテキストの上に表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-336">Text and image; the image is displayed above the text.</span></span>           |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-337">4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-337">4</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-338">テキストと画像。画像はテキストの左に表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-338">Text and image; the image is displayed to the left of the text.</span></span>  |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-339">5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-339">5</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-340">テキストと画像。画像はテキストの右に表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-340">Text and image; the image is displayed to the right of the text.</span></span> |

    public int dragDrop([int value])

### <a name="method-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-475">メソッド enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-475">Method enabled</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-476">オブジェクトを有効または無効にするかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-476">Determines whether to enable or disable the object.</span></span>

    public boolean enabled([boolean value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-477">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-477">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-478">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-478">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-479">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-479">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-480">オブジェクトが有効である場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-480">true if the object is enabled; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-481">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-481">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-482">有効になっているプロパティを使用すると、実行時にコントロールを有効または無効にできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-482">The enabled property allows controls to be enabled or disabled at run time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0994f-483">たとえば、アプリケーションの現在の状態には適用されないオブジェクトを無効にすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-483">For example, you can disable objects that do not apply to the current state of the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0994f-484">また、読み取り専用情報を提供する、エラー メッセージなどの、表示のためにのみ使用されるコントロールを無効にすることもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-484">You can also disable a control that is used only for display purposes, such as an error message, which provides read-only information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-490">Tahoma や Verdana など、使用するフォントの名前。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-490">The name of the font to use, such as Tahoma or Verdana.</span></span>

### <a name="method-foregroundcolor"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-501">メソッド foregroundColor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-501">Method foregroundColor</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-502">使用するコントロールのテキストの色を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-502">Gets or sets the text color for the control to use.</span></span>

    public int foregroundColor([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-503">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-503">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-504">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-504">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-505">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-505">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-506">パックされた RGB カラーを含む整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-506">An integer that contains a packed RGB color.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-507">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-507">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-508">返される整数には、次のようにパックされた RGB カラーが含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-508">The integer that is returned contains a packed RGB color as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-509">下位バイトには赤の相対強度の値が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-509">The low-order byte contains a value for the relative intensity of red.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-510">2 番目のバイトには緑の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-510">The second byte contains a value for green.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-511">3 番目のバイトには青の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-511">The third byte contains a value for blue.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-512">上位バイトはゼロでなければなりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-512">The high-order byte must be zero.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-513">1 バイトの最大値は 255 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-513">The maximum value for a single byte is 255.</span></span>

### <a name="method-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-514">メソッド height</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-514">Method height</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-515">コントロールの高さを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-515">Gets or sets the height of the control.</span></span>

    public int height(int value, [int mode])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-516">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-516">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-517">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-517">value</span></span>  

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-518">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-518">mode</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-519">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-519">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-520">ピクセル単位のコントロールの高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-520">The height of the control in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-521">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-521">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-522">値のパラメータを省略すると、正確なモードが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-522">Exact mode is used if the value parameter is omitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0994f-523">次の表に従って高さを計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-523">Calculate the height according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-524">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-524">Mode.</span></span>            | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-525">高さの計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-525">Height calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-526">-1 正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-526">-1 Exact.</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-527">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な高さが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-527">The exact height in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-528">0 自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-528">0 Auto.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-529">コントロールの高さは自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-529">The height of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-530">1 列の高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-530">1 Column height.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-531">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの高さが決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-531">The layout of the form determines the height of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-532">高さと高さ計算モードは別々に設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-532">The height and height calculation mode can be set separately.</span></span>

### <a name="method-heightmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-533">メソッド heightMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-533">Method heightMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-534">コントロールの高さの計算方法を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-534">Gets or sets a calculation mode for the height of the control.</span></span>

    public int heightMode([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-535">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-535">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-536">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-536">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-537">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-537">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-538">計算モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-538">The calculation mode.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-539">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-539">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-540">次の表に従って高さを計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-540">Calculate the height according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-541">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-541">Mode.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-542">高さの計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-542">Height Calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|----------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-543">正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-543">Exact.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-544">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な高さが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-544">The exact height in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-545">自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-545">Auto.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-546">コントロールの高さは自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-546">The height of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-547">列の高さ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-547">Column height.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-548">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの高さが決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-548">The layout of the form determines the height of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-549">計算モードが [自動] または [列の高さ] に設定されている場合は、コントロールの高さが変わることがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-549">The height of the control might change when the mode is set to auto or column height.</span></span>

### <a name="method-heightvalue"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-550">メソッド heightValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-550">Method heightValue</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-551">コントロールの高さを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-551">Gets or sets the height of the control.</span></span>

    public int heightValue([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-552">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-552">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-553">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-553">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-554">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-554">Return Value</span></span>

### <a name="method-name"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-608">メソッド名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-608">Method name</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-609">フォーム、レポート、テーブル、クエリ、または他のアプリケーション オブジェクトを識別するためのコードで使用される名前を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-609">Gets or sets the name that is used in code to identify a form, report, table, query, or other Finance and Operations application object.</span></span>

    public str name([str value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-610">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-610">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-611">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-611">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="0994f-612">コントロールに割り当てる名前。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-612">The name to assign to the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-613">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-613">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-614">アプリケーション オブジェクトを識別するためにコードで使用される名前。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-614">The name that is used in code to identify an application object.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-615">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-615">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-616">オブジェクトの名前プロパティ値は、コードの競合を避けるために、次の基準を満たしている必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-616">The name property value of an object must meet the following criteria to avoid code conflicts:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-617">文字で始める必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-617">It must start with a letter.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-618">250 文字を超えることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-618">It cannot exceed 250 characters.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-619">数字とアンダースコア (\_) 文字を含めることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-619">It can include numbers and underscore (\_) characters.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-620">句読点やスペースを含めることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-620">It cannot include punctuation or spaces.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-621">テーブルは、拡張データ型、基本列挙型、クラスなどの他のパブリック オブジェクトと同じ名前を持つことはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-621">Tables cannot have the same name as other public objects, such as extended data types, base enums, or classes.</span></span>

### <a name="method-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-738">メソッド width</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-738">Method width</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-739">コントロールの幅を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-739">Gets or sets the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int width(int value, [int mode])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-740">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-740">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-741">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-741">value</span></span>  

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-742">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-742">mode</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-743">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-743">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-744">ピクセル単位のコントロールの幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-744">The width of the control in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-745">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-745">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-746">値のパラメータを省略すると、正確なモードが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-746">Exact mode is used if the value parameter is omitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0994f-747">次の表に従って幅を計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-747">Calculate the width according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-748">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-748">Mode.</span></span>           | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-749">幅計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-749">Width calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|-----------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-750">-1 正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-750">-1 Exact.</span></span>       | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-751">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な幅が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-751">The exact width in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-752">0 自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-752">0 Auto.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-753">コントロールの幅は自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-753">The width of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-754">1 列の幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-754">1 Column width.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-755">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの幅が決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-755">The layout of the form determines the width of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-756">幅と幅計算モードは別々に設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-756">The width and width calculation mode can be set separately.</span></span>

### <a name="method-widthmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-757">メソッド widthMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-757">Method widthMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-758">コントロールの幅の計算方法を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-758">Gets or sets the calculation mode of the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int widthMode([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-759">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-759">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-760">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-760">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-761">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-761">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-762">現在の計算モードを示す整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-762">An integer value that indicates the current calculation mode.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-763">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-763">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-764">次の表に従って幅を計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-764">Calculate the width according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-765">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-765">Mode.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-766">幅計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-766">Width Calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|---------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-767">正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-767">Exact.</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-768">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な幅が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-768">The exact width in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-769">自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-769">Auto.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-770">コントロールの幅は自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-770">The width of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-771">列の幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-771">Column width.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-772">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの幅が決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-772">The layout of the form determines the width of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-773">モードが [自動] または [列の幅] に設定されている場合は、コントロールの幅が変わることがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-773">The width of the control might change when the mode is set to auto or column width.</span></span>

### <a name="method-widthvalue"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-774">メソッド widthValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-774">Method widthValue</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-775">コントロールの幅を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-775">Gets or sets the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int widthValue([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-776">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-776">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-777">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-777">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-778">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-778">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-779">ピクセル単位のコントロールの幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-779">The width in pixels of the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-780">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-780">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-781">コントロールの幅を変更するには、正確な幅の計算モードを使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-781">To change the width of the control, use the exact width calculation mode.</span></span>

## <a name="class-formbuildbuttongroupcontrol"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-787">クラス FormBuildButtonGroupControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-787">Class FormBuildButtonGroupControl</span></span>
    class FormBuildButtonGroupControl extends FormBuildControl

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-788">FormBuildButtonGroupControl クラスを使用すると、X++ コードとメタデータの作成、読み取り、更新、および削除を行うことができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-788">The FormBuildButtonGroupControl class lets you create, read, update, and delete X++ code and metadata.</span></span>

### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-789">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-789">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-790">この API が呼び出される前に、ユーザーが開発セキュリティ キー (SysDevelopment) にアクセスできることを確認します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-790">Make sure that the user has access to the development security key (SysDevelopment) before this API is called.</span></span>

    public boolean alignControl([boolean value])

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-921">コントロールをアラインする必要がある場合は true。それ以外の場合は false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-921">true if the control should be aligned; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-922">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-922">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-923">コントロールの左上隅は、最も長いラベルに従って配置されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-923">The upper-left corner of the control is aligned according to the longest label.</span></span>

### <a name="method-allowedit"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-924">メソッド allowEdit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-924">Method allowEdit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-925">ユーザーがコントロールの内容を変更できるかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-925">Determines whether the user can change the contents of the control.</span></span>

    public boolean allowEdit([boolean value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-926">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-926">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-927">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-927">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-928">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-928">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-929">コントロールを編集することができる場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-929">true if the control can be edited; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-930">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-930">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-931">コンテナー コントロールにこのプロパティが設定されると、コンテナー内のすべてのコントロールの変更は無効または有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-931">When this property is set on a container control, modifications are disabled or enabled for all controls within the container.</span></span>

### <a name="method-autodeclaration"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-948">メソッド autoDeclaration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-948">Method autoDeclaration</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-949">システムがコントロールと同じ名前を持つメンバー変数を宣言できるかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-949">Determines whether the system can declare a member variable that has the same name as the control.</span></span>

    public boolean autoDeclaration([boolean value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-950">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-950">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-951">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-951">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-952">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-952">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-953">このコントロールのためにメンバー変数を宣言することができる場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-953">true if the member variable can be declared for this control; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-954">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-954">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-955">コントロールには同じ名前を付けることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-955">Controls cannot have identical names.</span></span>

### <a name="method-backgroundcolor"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-956">メソッド backgroundColor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-956">Method backgroundColor</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-957">コントロールの背景色を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-957">Gets or sets the background color of the control.</span></span>

    public int backgroundColor([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-958">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-958">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-959">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-959">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-960">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-960">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-961">パックされた RGB カラーを含む整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-961">An integer that contains a packed RGB color.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-962">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-962">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-963">返される整数には、次のようにパックされた RGB カラーが含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-963">The integer that is returned contains a packed RGB color as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-964">下位バイトには赤の相対強度の値が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-964">The low-order byte contains a value for the relative intensity of red.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-965">2 番目のバイトには緑の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-965">The second byte contains a value for green.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-966">3 番目のバイトには青の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-966">The third byte contains a value for blue.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-967">上位バイトはゼロでなければなりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-967">The high-order byte must be zero.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-968">1 バイトの最大値は 255 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-968">The maximum value for a single byte is 255.</span></span>

### <a name="method-backstyle"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-969">メソッド backStyle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-969">Method backStyle</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-970">コントロールの背景色を透明にできるかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-970">Determines whether the control background can be transparent.</span></span>

    public int backStyle([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-971">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-971">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-972">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-972">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-973">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-973">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-974">コントロールの背景が透明の場合は 1、それ以外の場合は、0 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-974">1 if the control background can be transparent; otherwise, 0.</span></span>

### <a name="method-bold"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-975">メソッド bold</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-975">Method bold</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-976">コントロール内のテキストを出力するのに使用されるフォントの重量を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-976">Gets or sets the weight of font used to output text in the control.</span></span>

    public int bold([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-977">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-977">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-978">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-978">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-979">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-979">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-980">0 から 9 までの間の整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-980">An integer value between zero and nine, inclusive.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-981">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-981">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-982">返される整数には、次のようなフォントの重量が含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-982">The integer that is returned contains the weight of the font as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-983">0 既定のフォントの重量を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-983">0 Use the default font weight.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-984">1 シン。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-984">1 Thin.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-985">2 エクストラ ライト。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-985">2 Extra-light.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-986">3. ライト。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-986">3 Light.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-987">4 標準。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-987">4 Normal.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-988">5 中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-988">5 Medium.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-989">6 セミボールド。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-989">6 Semibold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-990">7 太字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-990">7 Bold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-991">8 極太。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-991">8 Extra-bold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-992">9 ヘビー。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-992">9 Heavy.</span></span>

    public ConfigurationKeyId configurationKey([ConfigurationKeyId value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1116">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1116">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1121">コンフィギュレーション キーは、このコントロールを表示するかどうかを決定するために使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1121">The configuration key is used to determine whether this control can be displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1122">コンフィギュレーション キーがシステムで無効な場合、コントロールはフォームで表示されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1122">If the configuration key is disabled in the system, the control is not displayed in the form.</span></span>

### <a name="method-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1155">メソッド enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1155">Method enabled</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1156">オブジェクトを有効または無効にするかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1156">Determines whether to enable or disable the object.</span></span>

    public boolean enabled([boolean value])

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1160">オブジェクトが有効である場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1160">true if the object is enabled; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1161">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1161">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1162">有効になっているプロパティを使用すると、実行時にコントロールを有効または無効にできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1162">The enabled property allows controls to be enabled or disabled at run time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1163">たとえば、アプリケーションの現在の状態には適用されないオブジェクトを無効にすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1163">For example, you can disable objects that do not apply to the current state of the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1164">また、読み取り専用情報を提供する、エラー メッセージなどの、表示のためにのみ使用されるコントロールを無効にすることもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1164">You can also disable a control that is used only for display purposes, such as an error message, which provides read-only information.</span></span>

### <a name="method-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1185">メソッド height</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1185">Method height</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1186">コントロールの高さを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1186">Gets or sets the height of the control.</span></span>

    public int height(int value, [int mode])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1187">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1187">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1188">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1188">value</span></span>  

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1189">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1189">mode</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1190">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1190">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1191">ピクセル単位のコントロールの高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1191">The height of the control in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1192">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1192">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1193">値のパラメータを省略すると、正確なモードが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1193">Exact mode is used if the value parameter is omitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1194">次の表に従って高さを計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1194">Calculate the height according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1195">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1195">Mode.</span></span>            | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1196">高さの計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1196">Height calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1197">-1 正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1197">-1 Exact.</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1198">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な高さが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1198">The exact height in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1199">0 自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1199">0 Auto.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1200">コントロールの高さは自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1200">The height of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1201">1 列の高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1201">1 Column height.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1202">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの高さが決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1202">The layout of the form determines the height of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1203">高さと高さ計算モードは別々に設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1203">The height and height calculation mode can be set separately.</span></span>

### <a name="method-heightmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1204">メソッド heightMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1204">Method heightMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1205">コントロールの高さの計算方法を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1205">Gets or sets a calculation mode for the height of the control.</span></span>

    public int heightMode([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1206">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1206">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1207">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1207">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1208">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1208">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1209">計算モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1209">The calculation mode.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1210">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1210">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1211">次の表に従って高さを計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1211">Calculate the height according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1212">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1212">Mode.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1213">高さの計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1213">Height Calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|----------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1214">正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1214">Exact.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1215">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な高さが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1215">The exact height in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1216">自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1216">Auto.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1217">コントロールの高さは自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1217">The height of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1218">列の高さ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1218">Column height.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1219">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの高さが決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1219">The layout of the form determines the height of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1220">計算モードが [自動] または [列の高さ] に設定されている場合は、コントロールの高さが変わることがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1220">The height of the control might change when the mode is set to auto or column height.</span></span>

### <a name="method-heightvalue"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1221">メソッド heightValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1221">Method heightValue</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1222">コントロールの高さを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1222">Gets or sets the height of the control.</span></span>

    public int heightValue([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1223">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1223">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1224">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1224">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1225">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1225">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1226">ピクセル単位の高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1226">The height in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1227">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1227">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1228">正確な高さ計算モードが使用されていない限り、コントロールの高さは変更されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1228">The height of the control is not changed unless the exact height calculation mode is used.</span></span>

### <a name="method-helptext"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1229">メソッド helpText</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1229">Method helpText</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1230">フィールドやコントロールのポイント時に、画面の下部に表示されるヘルプ テキストを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1230">Gets or sets the help text to display at the bottom of the screen when a field or control is pointed to.</span></span>

    public str helpText([str value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1231">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1231">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1232">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1232">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1233">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1233">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1234">画面の下部に表示される文字列。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1234">The string to be displayed at the bottom of the screen.</span></span>

### <a name="method-movecontrol"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1288">メソッド moveControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1288">Method moveControl</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1289">コントロールに指定されたコントロールを移動します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1289">Moves a specified control to the control.</span></span>

    public int moveControl(int controlId, [int insertAfterControlId])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1290">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1290">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1291">controlId</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1291">controlId</span></span>  

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1292">insertAfterControlId</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1292">insertAfterControlId</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1293">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1293">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1294">コントロールが正常に移動した場合は 1、それ以外の場合、0 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1294">1 if the control was moved successfully; otherwise, 0.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1295">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1295">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1296">一般に、指定したコントロールをコントロールに含めることができ、現在のコンテナーから移動できる場合、このメソッドは成功します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1296">In general, if the specified control can be contained in the control and can be moved from the container that it is currently in, this method should succeed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1297">ただし、場合によっては、参照グループ コントロールのインスタンス コントロールなど、コントロールを移動できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1297">However, in some cases, such as for the reference group control instance, controls cannot be moved.</span></span>

### <a name="method-name"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1298">メソッド名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1298">Method name</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1299">フォーム、レポート、テーブル、クエリ、または他のアプリケーション オブジェクトを識別するためのコードで使用される名前を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1299">Gets or sets the name that is used in code to identify a form, report, table, query, or other Finance and Operations application object.</span></span>

    public str name([str value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1300">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1300">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1301">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1301">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1302">コントロールに割り当てる名前。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1302">The name to assign to the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1303">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1303">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1304">アプリケーション オブジェクトを識別するためにコードで使用される名前。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1304">The name that is used in code to identify an application object.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1305">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1305">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1306">オブジェクトの名前プロパティ値は、コードの競合を避けるために、次の基準を満たしている必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1306">The name property value of an object must meet the following criteria to avoid code conflicts:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1307">文字で始める必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1307">It must start with a letter.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1308">250 文字を超えることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1308">It cannot exceed 250 characters.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1309">数字とアンダースコア (\_) 文字を含めることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1309">It can include numbers and underscore (\_) characters.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1310">句読点やスペースを含めることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1310">It cannot include punctuation or spaces.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1311">テーブルは、拡張データ型、基本列挙型、クラスなどの他のパブリック オブジェクトと同じ名前を持つことはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1311">Tables cannot have the same name as other public objects, such as extended data types, base enums, or classes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1342">ユーザーが Tab キーを押してコントロールに移動するときにコントロールがスキップされるかどうかを示す値を設定するか返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1342">Sets or returns a value that indicates whether the control is skipped when the user presses the TAB key to move to the control.</span></span>

    public boolean skip([boolean value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1343">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1343">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1344">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1344">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1345">コントロールの skip プロパティに割り当てる値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1345">The value to assign to the skip property of the control.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1347">コントロールに移動するためにユーザーが TAB キーを押すとコントロールがスキップされる場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1347">true if the control is skipped when the user presses the TAB key to move to the control; otherwise, false.</span></span>

### <a name="method-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1422">メソッド width</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1422">Method width</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1423">コントロールの幅を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1423">Gets or sets the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int width(int value, [int mode])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1424">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1424">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1425">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1425">value</span></span>  

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1426">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1426">mode</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1427">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1427">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1428">ピクセル単位のコントロールの幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1428">The width of the control in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1429">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1429">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1430">値のパラメータを省略すると、正確なモードが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1430">Exact mode is used if the value parameter is omitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1431">次の表に従って幅を計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1431">Calculate the width according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1432">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1432">Mode.</span></span>           | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1433">幅計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1433">Width calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|-----------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1434">-1 正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1434">-1 Exact.</span></span>       | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1435">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な幅が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1435">The exact width in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1436">0 自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1436">0 Auto.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1437">コントロールの幅は自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1437">The width of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1438">1 列の幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1438">1 Column width.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1439">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの幅が決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1439">The layout of the form determines the width of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1440">幅と幅計算モードは別々に設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1440">The width and width calculation mode can be set separately.</span></span>

### <a name="method-widthmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1441">メソッド widthMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1441">Method widthMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1442">コントロールの幅の計算方法を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1442">Gets or sets the calculation mode of the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int widthMode([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1443">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1443">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1444">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1444">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1445">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1445">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1446">現在の計算モードを示す整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1446">An integer value that indicates the current calculation mode.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1447">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1447">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1448">次の表に従って幅を計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1448">Calculate the width according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1449">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1449">Mode.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1450">幅計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1450">Width Calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|---------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1451">正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1451">Exact.</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1452">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な幅が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1452">The exact width in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1453">自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1453">Auto.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1454">コントロールの幅は自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1454">The width of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1455">列の幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1455">Column width.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="0994f-1456">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの幅が決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1456">The layout of the form determines the width of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1457">モードが [自動] または [列の幅] に設定されている場合は、コントロールの幅が変わることがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1457">The width of the control might change when the mode is set to auto or column width.</span></span>

### <a name="method-widthvalue"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1458">メソッド widthValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1458">Method widthValue</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1459">コントロールの幅を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1459">Gets or sets the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int widthValue([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1460">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1460">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1461">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1461">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1462">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1462">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1463">ピクセル単位のコントロールの幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1463">The width in pixels of the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="0994f-1464">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1464">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0994f-1465">コントロールの幅を変更するには、正確な幅の計算モードを使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0994f-1465">To change the width of the control, use the exact width calculation mode.</span></span>

    public int dragDrop([int value])
